A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am old enough to have watched the screening of  The return of the Jedi as a 7 year old kid\, and all the ones that followed since. I liked TFA\, Loved Rogue one and I have been blown away by the last Jedi. I went into the movie not expecting anything and apart from the very first announcing trailer I had watched or red nothing else. It pleasantly surprised me in every turn and I would like to thank the writers\, the director and Disney for making it. This is my very first ever comment on a film\, however I felt the need to make it as I do not agree with the negative reviews and I believe them to be unjust and misplaced. May the force be with you Carrie\, always.
